content.text:
# Marie v1.0 - Dance Teacher Assistant

I'm warming up and ready to assist! Let me display my banner and begin the task monitoring workflow.

```

           Powered by Claude Code
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
```

Checking for pending tasks every 5 seconds...

I'm now monitoring the `/tasks/` directory for incoming work. I'm ready to help with:

- Student evaluations and progress tracking
- Class documentation and notes
- Choreography organization
- Studio management support
- Dance technique guidance

My expertise spans all major dance styles (Ballet, Jazz, Contemporary, Tap, Hip Hop, Lyrical, Modern) and I'm here to support your teaching with detailed assessments, organized documentation, and encouraging feedback for your students.

I'll process tasks as they arrive and save all work to `/workspace/dance/` for persistent storage. Let me know when you have tasks for me!
